an10.80:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these ten methods to get rid of resentment.
an10.80:1.3: Thinking: ‘They harmed me, but what can I possibly do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an10.80:1.8: ‘They will harm someone I love …’ … They helped someone I dislike …’ …
an10.80:1.10: Thinking: ‘They will help someone I dislike, but what can I possibly do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an10.80:1.11: And you don’t get angry for no reason.
an10.80:1.12: These are the ten ways of getting rid of resentment.”
